short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Painter - AI-powered Part-of-Speech analysis tool, your elegant English reading assistant.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Painter is a powerful reading assistant that highlights sentence structure and parts of speech (PoS), such as verbs, subjects, and objects, using nested color levels. It’s the perfect tool for English reading and better comprehension.

Thanks to sawogus29 for the original development of the extension ‘Color Sentence’ and for sharing it as open source. Let’s appreciate his genius and generosity!
